headline: B4bomber: Temporarily Closed for Support 💖
title: App Temporarily Paused
description: Dear users, the app is temporarily closed because I need support to continue development. 🙏 The app is currently ads-free, and if you can, please donate any amount to help me release the next update with improvements. Every contribution matters! 💌 UPI ID for donation: 9824584454@ybl Thank you for your support! Your help keeps B4Bomber alive and improving. 🚀
